segments.text: The kitchen looks ordinary at first glance, with the window open to the yard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight highlights the sink area where the woman stands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding a plate, towel in hand, concentrating hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucetâ€”it's running full blast, overflowing wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down to the floor, pooling around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely unaware, foot in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, a boy on a stool reaches the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are spread unevenly; it's about to go.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate in one hand, cookies in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby has her arm up, ready for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're collaborating quietly, out of the woman's sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden through the window is pristine, bushes neatly trimmed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how much is happening without anyone noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the stool will tip before she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR
